name: @fastly/compute-actions
description: GitHub Actions for building on the Fastly platform.
author: Fastly <oss@fastly.com>

scripts.bundle-setup: npx ncc build setup/index.js -o setup/dist --license licenses.txt
scripts.bundle-build: npx ncc build build/index.js -o build/dist --license licenses.txt
scripts.bundle-deploy: npx ncc build deploy/index.js -o deploy/dist --license licenses.txt
scripts.bundle-all: npm run bundle-setup && npm run bundle-build && npm run bundle-deploy
